metadata.description: personal collection of Claude Code plugins and tools

plugins.name: notebooklm-connector
plugins.description: A plugin to manage NotebookLM notebooks and query them using integrated features.

plugins.name: toolbox
plugins.description: Personal utility commands and tools for Claude Code

plugins.name: plugin-bookmarks
plugins.description: Bookmark third-party Claude Code plugins you want to remember

plugins.name: extension-wiki
plugins.description: Analyze Claude Code plugins and generate wiki-style HTML reports with security audit, architecture review, and quality scores

plugins.name: macos-notifier
plugins.description: Silent macOS desktop notifications when Claude Code needs attention

plugins.name: worktree-plus
plugins.description: Enhanced git worktree: custom branch prefix, selective copy/symlink for gitignored files
